messages.title: Stand Up For What Matters
messages.content: Let's return more Green members of Parliament

messages.title: This election isn't about the next 5 years - it's about the next 50 years
messages.content: The Green Party is offering real opposition to this Government's extreme Brexit. We have the vision to deliver an alternative future for our country - and our place in the world. The Green Party offers a different kind of politics.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: An economy that works for all of us

mentions.candidate: Ron Meldrum is delighted to be standing in Eastleigh again giving people the opportunity to elect a Green MP.
mentions.otherPartyLeaderCandidate: The Conservatives think they have this election sewn up.

issues.brexitEurope: The Green Party is offering real opposition to this Government's extreme Brexit.
issues.economy: He is concerned about the excessive UK debt the Tory government has built up which could send the UK towards bankruptcy if the Brexit negotiations go wrong.
issues.education: He supported Green issues since the age of 18. Through appropriate training in our education system.
issues.environment: Ron regularly raises issues about how global warming is affecting our children and the future of our planet. To shape an economy for everyone while preserving a safe environment.
issues.governance: To put power back in your hands through a citizen’s democracy.
issues.health: Ron is determined to protect the NHS from being sold to foreign investors for profit rather than the health of the nation and would promote legislation to address mental health issues, both short term and long term.

leaflet.personalStatement: Ron has supported Green issues since the age of 18.

images.caption: Ron Meldrum - Your Green Party Candidate

examples: Ron Meldrum is delighted to be standing in Eastleigh again giving people the opportunity to elect a Green MP.
He supports local businesses for local people and wants to see the tax system simplified and overhauled so that everyone pays their fair share.
To shape an economy for everyone while preserving a safe environment.

Ron is determined to protect the NHS from being sold to foreign investors for profit rather than the health of the nation and would promote legislation to address mental health issues, both short term and long term.

personalStories.story: Ron has supported Green issues since the age of 18.

examples: The Conservatives think they have this election sewn up.
Ron Meldrum is delighted to be standing in Eastleigh again giving people the opportunity to elect a Green MP.
